config.screen.ghastautopilot.title: Ghast Autopilot
config.option.ghastautopilot.minimumHeig: The minimum height to be able to use the Ghast Autopilot. Minimum value: 32, Maximum value: 320.
config.option.ghastautopilot.stopThresho: The distance to stop the Ghast Autopilot. Minimum value: 0.0, Maximum value: 10.0.

commands.ghastautopilot.error.notRiding: You are not riding Happy Ghast
commands.ghastautopilot.error.tooLow: You are too low to use Happy Ghast Autopilot
commands.ghastautopilot.arrived: You have arrived at your destination
